Container.Overview:
CV Manager - Admin Interface
Professional CV/Resume management with full editing capabilities. Create, manage and organize your professional CV with:
• Visual career timeline with country flags • ATS-optimized formatting • Granular visibility control • Profile picture support • Print/PDF optimization • JSON import/export
ADMIN VERSION - Full CRUD access. Keep this behind authentication or on internal network only.
TIP: Also install "CV Manager Public" for a read-only shareable version on port 3001 that uses the SAME appdata path.

Config.Name: AppData
Config.Description: Database and profile pictures storage. IMPORTANT: Use same path for both Admin and Public containers to share data.
